name: Platformer Bro!
description:
Made for the Make a Level Game Jam! First ever game that I made and first ever game jam that I participated in. I Learned a lot and had a lot of fun will definitely do more game jams in the future! I know it is simple but, I gotta start somewhere. Hope you enjoy. Cheers! 

Player Controls:

A and D : Move

Space and W : Jump
